author: vors
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves issue #xyz.
- [ ] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->
- Remove redundant 'Build from Source' column, since the Section name already implies it
- Lists with 1 bullet-point are weird-looking, especially sub-lists
title: Formatting in top-level README.md
